custom_domain.title: Custom Domain
custom_domain.description: Custom Domain to use for the website

server-alias.title: Server Alias
server-alias.description: Server Alias List separated by space

type.title: Backend Type
type.description: Type of slave. If redirect, the slave will redirect to the given url. If zope, the rewrite rules will be compatible with Virtual Host Monster

path.title: Backend Path
path.description: Path to proxy to in the backend

default-path.title: Default Path
default-path.description: Provide default path to redirect user to when user access / (the site root)

ssl_crt.title: SSL Certificate
ssl_crt.description: Content of the SSL Certificate file

ssl_key.title: SSL Key
ssl_key.description: Content of the SSL Key file

ssl_ca_crt.title: SSL Certificate Authority's Certificate
ssl_ca_crt.description: Content of the CA certificate file

https-only.title: HTTPS Only
https-only.description: If set to true, http requests will be redirected to https

ssl-proxy-verify.title: Verify Backend Certificates
ssl-proxy-verify.description: If set to true, Backend SSL Certificates will be checked and frontend will refuse to proxy if certificate is invalid

ssl_proxy_ca_crt.title: SSL Backend Authority's Certificate
ssl_proxy_ca_crt.description: Content of the SSL Certificate Authority file of the backen (to be used with ssl-proxy-verify)

enable_cache.title: Enable Cache
enable_cache.description: If set to true, http caching server (Apache Traffic Server) will be used between frontend apache and backend

disable-no-cache-request.title: Disable 'no-cache' requests
disable-no-cache-request.description: If set to true, no-cache control headers will be disabled

disable-via-header.title: Disable 'Via' headers from cache
disable-via-header.description: If set to true, via headers will be disabled

prefer-gzip-encoding-to-backend.title: Prefer gzip Encoding for Backend
prefer-gzip-encoding-to-backend.description: If set to true, if a request is made with accept encoding 'gzip', only that one will be transferred to the backend

disabled-cookie-list.title: Disabled Cookies
disabled-cookie-list.description: List of Cookies separated by space that will not be sent to the backend

apache_custom_http.title: HTTP configuration
apache_custom_http.description: Raw http configuration in python template format. Your site will be rejected if you use it without notification and approval of frontend administrators

apache_custom_https.title: HTTPS configuration
apache_custom_https.description: Raw https configuration in python template format. Your site will be rejected if you use it without notification and approval of frontend administrators
